# cpp

### Syntax highlighting

```vim
:TSInstall cpp
```

### Supported language servers

- sourcekit
- clangd
- ccls

### Supported formatters

- astyle
- clang_format
- uncrustify

### Supported linters

- clang_check
- cppcheck
- cpplint
- gccdiag
